original_text: If so, the leaders must take her to the entrance of her father's house. The men of the town must throw stones at her there, until she dies. She has done a very bad thing that brings shame on Israel. She has had sex like a prostitute while she lived in her father's house. You must remove evil acts like this from among you.
korean_text: 그 처녀를 그의 아버지 집 문에서 끌어내고 그 성읍 사람들이 그를 돌로 쳐죽일지니 이는 그가 그의 아버지 집에서 창기의 행동을 하여 이스라엘 중에서 악을 행하였음이라 너는 이와 같이 하여 너희 가운데서 악을 제할지니라

sentences.original_text: If so, the leaders must take her
to the entrance of her father's house.
The men of the town must throw stones at her there,
sentences.korean_translation: 마을 사람들은 그곳에서 그녀에게 돌을 던져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: She has done a very bad thing
She has had sex like a prostitute
while she lived in her father's house.
You must remove evil acts like this
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이런 악한 행위를 제거해야 합니다
